Translations.Text: N’intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) mugihe yabwira umusore wiwe ati:- jewe nzobandanya gusa ngenda kugeza aho nzoshika kumahuriro y’ibiyaga bibiri, canke mbandanye ngenda ibinjana n’ibindi kugeza aho nzohura nuwo nshaka guhura nawe
Mugihe bashika bose uko ari babiri, ariho kumahwaniro y’ivyo biyaga uko ari bibiri, baribagiye impamba yabo ariyo fi, nawe aca yifatira inzira yiwe yukuja kukiyaga
Bamaze gushika imbere intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) ibwira wamusore wiwe iti:- nuduhe ibifungurwa vyacu vyo mugitondo kuko urabona yuko turushe muri runo rugendo rwacu

Wamusore amwishura ati:- urabona harya hantu twaruhukiye kuri urya musozi, aho niho nibagiriye yafi yacu, kandi ntawundi yayinyibagije atari Shetani yatumye ndavyibagira, intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) aca abandanya urugendo rwiwe aja kukiyaga k’urugendo rw’igitangaza
Intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) ivuga iti:- aha niho twashaka gushika, baca basubira inyuma bakurikira inzira yabo
Baca basanga umwe mubashumvyi bacu twahaye imigisha ivuye kuri twebwe nuwo twigishije nuguha ubumenyi bwinshi buvuye kuri twebwe
Intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) ibwira wa musore iti:- mbega ndagukurikire kugira ngo unyigishe ibiri muri bwaburongozi wigishijwe
Nawe amwishura ati:- mu vy’ukuri wewe ntushobora kwihangana kuba hamwe nanje
Mbega ushobora kwihangana gute kubintu utazi ukuri kwavyo
Nawe yishura ati:- Imana ibishatse uzombona ndimu bantu bihangana, kandi sinzohakana itegeko ryawe
Intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) imubwira iti:- niwa nkurikira ntusubire kumbaza icarico cose kugeza aho jewe nzotangura kubi kumenyesha
